README.md

This repository, Submit, is for the Coursera class, Getting and Cleaning Data

It consists of the following:
*** This README file.
*** project.R program file
*** CodeBook.RM - the code book explaining the variables, the data,
    and transformations done and cleaning steps performed.
*** Project.csv - this CSV file is the tidy data set produced by
    project.R.  It was renamed to project.txt for submission to
    Coursera
